message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer on this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand that $9000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you a price of $11000, which is a significant discount from my initial offer. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I still think $11000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $9500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $9500. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking of a price of $11500. It's a bit higher than my previous offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $11500. I'm willing to offer $9000 again, but this time it's not a negotiable price. I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.
